title: Baasha Paaru Lyrics Baasha
stanzas:
hey baasha paaru
baasha paaru
pattaalathu nadaiya paaru
pagai nadungum
padaiya paaru.

Coatu suitum rendu eduthu
pottu nadakkum puliya paru
pattri eriyum neruppa pola
sutterikkum vizhiya paaru

raththam vaervai
rendum konda
rajaanganthin
mannan thaanada

ivan perukkulle
gaandham undu
unmai thaanadaa (2)
